title: Celia Cruz - Exitos Eternos + (2003)@flac
description:
LINER NOTES

Celia Cruz is the Queen of Salsa. 
Her career has spanned over five decades, and her amazing voice and rich musical legacy remain intact. More than just a mere Salsa singer; Celia is the ambassador of Hispanic culture reaching millions around the world for generations. Celia's accolades include a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, multiple Grammy awards, the prestigious National Endowment for the Arts and many more. Still her gift to her adoring legion of fans is her music. The contagious joy of her voice, the movement of those Latin rhythms, her signature shouts of "Azucar!" and her everlasting enthusiasm for life. 
Universal Music Latino is honored to capture many of these historical memories with the release of EXITOS ETERNOS, a truly unique compilation that contains the most important songs of the last chapter of her career. Timeless standards such as "La Vida Es Un Carnaval", "La Negra Tiene Tumbao", "Que Le Den Candela" and her moving tribute to her beloved homeland of Cuba "Por Si Acaso No Regreso" are included. EXITOS ETERNOS features collaborations with India on the fiery "La Voz De La Experiencia" and a moving duet with Vicente Fernandez "Tu Voz". An exceptional live performer, EXITOS ETERNOS also includes performances of classics songs "Cucala", "Quimbara" and "Guantanamera". 
The video for "Que Le Den Candela" has been added as an extra bonus. Vive la reinal!
